nodes.text: Star Wars Volume 1: In the Shadow of Yavin

Star Wars Volume 1: In the Shadow of Yavin is a Star Wars Legends trade paperback that collects issues 1–6 of the comic-book series Star Wars from author Brian Wood, as well as the story "Star Wars: The Assassination of Darth Vader," originally published in Free Comic Book Day 2013. It was published by Dark Horse Books on October 1, 2013.

After the destruction of the Death Star, the Rebels are hounded by the Empire. Suspecting a spy in their ranks, Princess Leia forms a secret X-wing squadron—which includes Luke Skywalker—to expose the spy and find a safe home. Meanwhile, Han Solo and Chewbacca are sent on a covert mission! Collects Star Wars #1-#6 and Free Comic Book Day 2013.
